description: I noticed that the most popular boxed soup at my supermarket is a tomato and red pepper soup, so I decided to come up with my own version.
title: Puréed Tomato and Red Pepper Soup
title_page: Puréed Tomato and Red Pepper Soup Recipe - NYT Cooking
